scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-array:d3,d3-axis:d3,d3-dispatch:d3,d3-drag:d3,d3-ease:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-selection:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-simple-slider.js --extend -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-simple-slider.js -c -m -o build/d3-simple-slider.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/d3-simple-slider.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-simple-slider.js build/d3-simple-slider.min.js
